1.english: The book of the genealogy of Jesus Christ, the son of David, the son of Abraham.
1.wedau: [book] ana  [genealogy] ana Yesu Keriso  natuna ana David  natuna ana Abraham
1.translation_notes: Primary dimension: Wisdom (0.73); Strong secondary: Love

2.english: Abraham became the father of Isaac. Isaac became the father of Jacob. Jacob became the father of Judah and his brothers.
2.wedau: Abraham [became]  Tamatei ana [isaac] [isaac] [became]  Tamatei ana Jacob Jacob [became]  Tamatei ana [judah] ma ana tevera

3.english: Judah became the father of Perez and Zerah by Tamar. Perez became the father of Hezron. Hezron became the father of Ram.
3.wedau: [judah] [became]  Tamatei ana [perez] ma [zerah] au [tamar] [perez] [became]  Tamatei ana [hezron] [hezron] [became]  Tamatei ana [ram]

4.english: Ram became the father of Amminadab. Amminadab became the father of Nahshon. Nahshon became the father of Salmon.
4.wedau: [ram] [became]  Tamatei ana [amminadab] [amminadab] [became]  Tamatei ana [nahshon] [nahshon] [became]  Tamatei ana [salmon]

5.english: Salmon became the father of Boaz by Rahab. Boaz became the father of Obed by Ruth. Obed became the father of Jesse.
5.wedau: [salmon] [became]  Tamatei ana [boaz] au [rahab] [boaz] [became]  Tamatei ana [obed] au [ruth] [obed] [became]  Tamatei ana [jesse]

6.english: Jesse became the father of King David. David became the father of Solomon by her who had been Uriah’s wife.
6.wedau: [jesse] [became]  Tamatei ana kingi David David [became]  Tamatei ana [solomon] au ana aiyai ana  [uriah’s] [wife]

7.english: Solomon became the father of Rehoboam. Rehoboam became the father of Abijah. Abijah became the father of Asa.
7.wedau: [solomon] [became]  Tamatei ana [rehoboam] [rehoboam] [became]  Tamatei ana [abijah] [abijah] [became]  Tamatei ana [asa]

8.english: Asa became the father of Jehoshaphat. Jehoshaphat became the father of Joram. Joram became the father of Uzziah.
8.wedau: [asa] [became]  Tamatei ana [jehoshaphat] [jehoshaphat] [became]  Tamatei ana [joram] [joram] [became]  Tamatei ana [uzziah]

9.english: Uzziah became the father of Jotham. Jotham became the father of Ahaz. Ahaz became the father of Hezekiah.
9.wedau: [uzziah] [became]  Tamatei ana [jotham] [jotham] [became]  Tamatei ana [ahaz] [ahaz] [became]  Tamatei ana [hezekiah]

10.english: Hezekiah became the father of Manasseh. Manasseh became the father of Amon. Amon became the father of Josiah.
10.wedau: [hezekiah] [became]  Tamatei ana [manasseh] [manasseh] [became]  Tamatei ana [amon] [amon] [became]  Tamatei ana [josiah]

11.english: Josiah became the father of Jechoniah and his brothers, at the time of the exile to Babylon.
11.wedau: [josiah] [became]  Tamatei ana [jechoniah] ma ana tevera au  mara ana  [exile] da [babylon]

12.english: After the exile to Babylon, Jechoniah became the father of Shealtiel. Shealtiel became the father of Zerubbabel.
12.wedau: muriyai  [exile] da [babylon] [jechoniah] [became]  Tamatei ana [shealtiel] [shealtiel] [became]  Tamatei ana [zerubbabel]

13.english: Zerubbabel became the father of Abiud. Abiud became the father of Eliakim. Eliakim became the father of Azor.
13.wedau: [zerubbabel] [became]  Tamatei ana [abiud] [abiud] [became]  Tamatei ana [eliakim] [eliakim] [became]  Tamatei ana [azor]

14.english: Azor became the father of Zadok. Zadok became the father of Achim. Achim became the father of Eliud.
14.wedau: [azor] [became]  Tamatei ana [zadok] [zadok] [became]  Tamatei ana [achim] [achim] [became]  Tamatei ana [eliud]

15.english: Eliud became the father of Eleazar. Eleazar became the father of Matthan. Matthan became the father of Jacob.
15.wedau: [eliud] [became]  Tamatei ana [eleazar] [eleazar] [became]  Tamatei ana [matthan] [matthan] [became]  Tamatei ana Jacob

16.english: Jacob became the father of Joseph, the husband of Mary, from whom was born Jesus, who is called Christ.
16.wedau: Jacob [became]  Tamatei ana Joseph  [husband] ana Mary au aiyai  [born] Yesu aiyai  ghorehi Keriso
16.translation_notes: Primary dimension: Wisdom (0.73); Strong secondary: Love

17.english: So all the generations from Abraham to David are fourteen generations; from David to the exile to Babylon fourteen generations; and from the carrying away to Babylon to the Christ, fourteen generations.
17.wedau: yamna anatapuhi  [generations] au Abraham da David  [fourteen] [generations;] au David da  [exile] da [babylon] [fourteen] [generations;] ma au  [carrying] [away] da [babylon] da  Keriso [fourteen] [generations]

18.english: Now the birth of Jesus Christ was like this: After his mother, Mary, was engaged to Joseph, before they came together, she was found pregnant by the Holy Spirit.
18.wedau: ina marana  [birth] ana Yesu Keriso  [like] [this:] muriyai ana hinana Mary  [engaged] da Joseph naona tauhi neꞌi [together] tauna  tuhaghai [pregnant] au  [holy] aruwa
18.translation_notes: Primary dimension: Wisdom (0.91); Strong secondary: Love

19.english: Joseph, her husband, being a righteous man, and not willing to make her a public example, intended to put her away secretly.
19.wedau: Joseph ana [husband]   [righteous] oroto ma egha ghohaghohana da rura ana  [public] [example] [intended] da terei ana [away] [secretly]
19.translation_notes: Primary dimension: Justice (0.74); Strong secondary: Wisdom

20.english: But when he thought about these things, behold, an angel of the Lord appeared to him in a dream, saying, “Joseph, son of David, don’t be afraid to take to yourself Mary, your wife, for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Spirit.
20.wedau: tuna maranaina tauna [thought] awarina ina [things] [behold] [an] [angel] ana  Guyau [appeared] da tauna au  [dream] riwa ipa [“joseph] natuna ana David [don’t]  [afraid] da varahai da [yourself] Mary ami [wife] yamna raketana aiyai  [conceived] au ana  ana  [holy] aruwa
20.translation_notes: Primary dimension: Wisdom (0.89); Strong secondary: Love

21.english: She shall give birth to a son. You shall name him Jesus, for it is he who shall save his people from their sins.”
21.wedau: tauna ina verei [birth] da  natuna omi ina wava tauna Yesu yamna tauna  tauna aiyai ina [save] ana rava au ahi [sins”]
21.translation_notes: Primary dimension: Wisdom (0.70); Strong secondary: Love

22.english: Now all this has happened that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the Lord through the prophet, saying,
22.wedau: ina marana anatapuhi ina ana [happened] raketana tauna ita  ririweiya aiyai  [spoken] au  Guyau au  peroveta riwa ipa
22.translation_notes: Primary dimension: Wisdom (0.70); Strong secondary: Love

23.english: “Behold, the virgin shall be with child, and shall give birth to a son. They shall call his name Immanuel;” which is, being interpreted, “God with us.”
23.wedau: [“behold]  [virgin] ina  maitehi ghoraghora ma ina verei [birth] da  natuna tauhi ina ghorehi ana wava [immanuel;”] aiyai   [interpreted] [“god] maitehi [us”]

24.english: Joseph arose from his sleep, and did as the angel of the Lord commanded him, and took his wife to himself;
24.wedau: Joseph [arose] au ana [sleep] ma rura   [angel] ana  Guyau ririweiya tauna ma varahai ana [wife] da [himself;]

25.english: and didn’t know her sexually until she had given birth to her firstborn son. He named him Jesus.
25.wedau: ma [didn’t] haramaneꞌi ana [sexually] [until] tauna ana verei [birth] da ana [firstborn] natuna tauna [named] tauna Yesu
25.translation_notes: Primary dimension: Wisdom (0.71); Strong secondary: Love
